name: Home is Coming (GGJ 2019)
description:
DESCRIPTION :

HomeIsComing, a game where you play as a nomad looking desperately for a home in a not so welcoming world.

LINK TO : Global Game Jam

HOW TO PLAY :

Plays with the mouse, use right click on the defferent resources to harvest them and move on the map.

THE OBJECTIF :

You must browse the map by searching for a civilization to create a community with a population of up to 30 people to win.

Credit for the Team :
Select the "Crédit" button in the main menu
